name: Photo! 3D Album Gallery
summary: Learn about .PGAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Photo! 3D Album allows you to choose a design template and add your JPEG photos to frames within that gallery design. After importing your photos you can preview them in the gallery and choose to fit, crop, or rotate them in the frame. After previewing them, you can save the gallery as a PGAL file, which allows you to reopen the gallery at a later time for editing or viewing purposes. You can save PGAL galleries locally on your computer, burn them to a CD/DVD, or upload them to a website.
The galleries you can choose from include Art Gallery, Camp, Chinese Garden, Exhibition Hall, Glamour Exhibition, Halloween, Neon Maze, Pyramids, and Showroom.
NOTE: Photo! 3D Album has been discontinued.

description: A PGAL file contains a gallery of pictures created by Photo! 3D Album, a program used to present pictures in a 3D environment such as an art gallery or Egyptian pyramid. It stores JPEG images imported by a user in a 3D gallery environment.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pgal file in Photo! 3D Album 1.2
images.caption: PGAL file open in Photo! 3D Album 1.2
